name: Successfully designing and building to Passivhaus standards
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: How do you approach a Passivhaus project? This session covers the design and building of Passivhaus with examples from around the UK. It also explores how well Passivhaus works in practice.

presentations.name: Designing, constructing and monitoring the first Passivhaus schools in the UK
Case study - UEA building
presentations.speakers: Ben Binns, University of East Anglia

presentations.name: Case study - UEA Passivhaus building East Anglia
